Package org.apache.mahout.utils.regex

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RegexFormatter  
    RegexTransformer
    Transforms the match of a regular expression.

    ChainTransformer

    Collapses/converts all whitespace to a single tab

    No-op
